verses.roman:
prākṛtāprākṛta sṛṣṭi kailā eka-kṣaṇe
aśeṣa-vaikuṇṭhājāṇḍa svasvanātha-sane

synonyms: prākṛta-aprākṛta—material and spiritual; sṛṣṭi—creation; kailā—did; eka-kṣaṇe—in one moment; aśeṣa—unlimited; vaikuṇṭha—Vaikuṇṭha planets; aja-aṇḍa—material planets; sva-sva-nātha-sane—with their own predominating deities.
translation: "At Vṛndāvana, the Lord immediately created all material and spiritual planets in one moment. Indeed, all of them were created with their predominating deities.
